thread.section_title: Its4women Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Its4women | www.its4women.ie
thread.title: Helen Howes

author: Helen Howes
title: Helen Howes
text: I have been using It's4women for a number of years, initailly and in the main part for the great value. I found the service in the begining difficult with long waits and unanswered calls. However in the last year the service has improved greatly. The online chat is extremly efficient and useful. The windscreen cover last year went so smoothly (on a Sunday) and this year I didn't have to ask or pay for employer indemnity, it was automatically included. I now have my car, home and travel insurance with It's4women
